title: Pixel 2 Camera Crashes on Opening
content:
Whenever I open the camera app it opens for a second and then closes. I noticed that if I try and use the front facing camera it is fine but when I switch to the back camera it crashes. 

This started after I updated to the July Security Patch.
I have tried resetting my phone, clearing the cache and storage of the google camera app and uninstalling updates and reinstalling them. 

I also noticed that sometimes it randomly works for a few seconds but can't focus and then it eventually crashes again.
Other apps also hang when I try and use the rear camera.

Is there anything else I should do before having to factory reset my phone or having to get a replacement?
